original_text: The earth shall quake before them; the heavens shall tremble: the sun and the moon shall be dark, and the stars shall withdraw their shining:
korean_text: 그 앞에서 땅이 진동하며 하늘이 떨며 해와 달이 캄캄하며 별들이 빛을 거두도다

sentences.original_text: The earth shall quake before them
The sun and the moon shall be dark
and the stars shall withdraw their shining
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 별들이 그 빛을 거두어 들일 것이라
